name: Countess Chelsea
info: A Sinner who is adept at defending. Increases Max HP by 10%.

media.title: JP Countess Chelsea Character Trailer
media.author: 無期迷途 [むきめいと] ー公式ー

criminalRecord:
A famous Eastside upstart who has a fickle temper and an extravagant spending habit and often shows absurd behaviors.

The top suspect for the mass disappearance in the Count's mansion a few years ago. The legitimacy of the subject's peerage inheritance is still largely controversial. There has been multiple charges against her, such as abusing her special power to produce gems while hiding her Sinner identity and intentionally disturbing market balance, posing a serious threat to Eastside's economic development.

--

Interrogation reveals that the primary motives behind the subject's crime were her confinement and her pet cat Sitri's murder by the old count. The subject is emotionally stable in her detention and never hesitates to donate to charity events supporting causes such as stray animal adoption and human rights protection.

The subject's power allows her to produce gems, but under the Bureau's strict supervision, she no longer poses a threat to Eastside's economy and market equilibrium.
mutationAssessment:
+++* Ability Summary
Using her special power, the subject is able to convert organic matters into hard crystal gems and turn minerals into a leopard named //Sitri// at will, commanding it to execute simple attack and defense orders during battles.

+++* Awakening Signs
Judging from the timing the subject began squandering gems, the awakening happened about five to ten years ago. The precise context is to be investigated, but the awakening is suspected to have to do with intense emotional fluctuations.

+++* Corruption State
Although no physical health issues have been detected, gem production consumes a lot of energy and the use of special power can wear out the subject. The subject's eccentric behavior is however unrelated to corruption but only due to the subject's character.
ecbFlavourText:
"Bury the unbearable past with dazzling gems."
"From today onwards, I am free."
interrogation1:
Brushing off her offer to become her sugar baby, the Chief presents Chelsea with a series of testimonies from others who received similar offers in the past, detailing the psychological trauma caused as a result of her repeated advances. Chelsea insists that she just wanted them to be happy, that she loves them, and adds that she loves the Chief almost as much as Sitri, her favorite cat. The Chief then presents her with several missing persons cases, one of which involves 'an old Count.' At this, Chelsea's demeanor changes suddenly. As the Chief questions her further, she admits to killing him along with the others, and to hiding their bodies by turning them into gem statues. She also admits to bribing the Public Security Bureau to close their investigation, stating that anyone's silence can be bought for the right price. When the Chief asks if her sugar mama offer is another attempt at bribery, Chelsea grows panicked and apologetic, saying that her interest in the Chief is genuine. At that moment, Nightingale interrupts with a threatening call from a city councilor, demanding to apply for Chelsea's bail. After they hang up, Chelsea laughs, amused by this turn of events, and Nightingale pulls the Chief aside to inform them that someone from the council has already arrived, forcing the interrogation to conclude early.

You have been receiving harassing calls. Things are stressful. Nightingale told you that someone leaked the information on the gem Sinner. As a result, trouble is now at your doorstep. Several people, including a councilor, demand that you release Chelsea. They promise they'll make all your problems go away using money. This matter won't end easily.
interrogation2:
Over the next few days, the Bureau's phone and mailbox are inundated with further threats regarding Chelsea's release. The Chief returns to confront Chelsea, catching the tail end of her phone call with an unknown man promising to help get rid of the Chief for her. Initially annoyed, she claims that the call was just one of the many bootlickers after her money, but despite this, her soon mood lifts. She says that during the days she learned to make jewelry, people would always smile when she gave them gems. The Chief tries to refute the idea that money can always buy happiness, but Chelsea counters them at every turn - that is, until they say that money can't buy 'sincerity from the heart.' Chelsea agrees, but offers an alternative. She shows the Chief a clip from a documentary about her. In it, her master brought her a cat. She named it Sitri, but then abruptly turns the video off before the scene plays out further. She shares how eventually, Chelsea's master recommended her to become the Count's exclusive gem cutter, and her and her master became estranged. Until he died, he would only come to her when he wanted to experience the life of luxury. The Chief asks if after all this, she thinks that her and her sugar babies are truly happy. She replies that while she doesn't know, at the very least, Sitri must be. The Chief departs as Chelsea lapses back into her facade, though she does promise that she'll help them take care of the threatening calls. The Chief realizes that in the frenzy of the last few days, they haven't had any time to check their personal mailbox. Upon reaching it, they are ambushed and knocked unconscious. Meanwhile, Chelsea resumes the documentary, watching a happy Sitri jump into her arms.

Chelsea, who shared her past stories with you, said that she would intercept everything for you. But when you went outside to check your mail, someone attacked you out of the blue. Unconscious, you don't know where you are being taken to.
interrogation3:
The Chief awakens, drugged, back in Countess' Court, and their kidnapped is revealed to be none other than the councilor who threatened them over the phone. The councilor's men bring in an outraged Chelsea, and the Councilor offers her the Chief as a gift in exchange for getting him the council's top seat. When she refuses, he has one of his subordinates threaten the Chief at knife-point. He offers to shake Chelsea's hand in honor of their newfound collaboration. She agrees, then laughs as she turns him into a gemstone statue, killing him almost instantly. The rest of the councilor's men attempt to flee, but Chelsea kills them all in a rain of gems. She continues, lost in the haze of her rage, until the Chief manages to crawl over to her and use the Shackles to bring her back into awareness. Chelsea drops to the ground, torn between anger, fear, and guilt, but the Chief comforts her. Chelsea breaks down, devastated that she allowed this to happen again, just like when she killed the Count. She says that the Count killed Sitri to force her to obey him, ripping Sitri's heart out right in front of her, putting it in her hand. When she lost herself to her anger, Chelsea says that she felt like she could still feel Sitri's heart warm in her hand, as if it were still beating. As she cries, the Chief assures her they are living proof that she can protect her loved ones. The Chief thanks her, and Chelsea once again offers to be their sugar mama. The Chief replies that instead, they prefer a companion who they could trust to fight alongside them. Despite this, a few days later, Chelsea pays off employees to not bother the Chief about the details of the events in Countess' Court, filling their office with luxuries, and once again inviting them to be her sugar baby.

Gems are beautiful. What's ugly are the jackals that followed the smell and came. Rather than being her sugar baby, you'd rather fight alongside Chelsea. Protecting each other is the best way to keep each other company.
arrestRec1: Wanted and arrested by the Public Security Bureau for being involved in multiple emotional harassment cases and financial disputes. When law enforcement discovered the subject could produce gems out of thin air, they escorted her to the MBCC for further investigation.
arrestRec2: Used to be an apprentice lapidary and knew the old Count through her master. The subject admitted she has murdered over ten people in the Count's mansion, inherited the peerage by illegitimate means, and taken over all the property under the old Count's name.
arrestRec3: The gem leopard //Sitri// is named after the subject's cat she adopted in her apprentice days, which was very close to Chelsea. According to the subject's account, the old Count mutilated and killed Sitri for no reason, which became the primary motive for Chelsea's crime.
arrestRec4: The victims in the Count's mansion were all turned into gem sculptures and hidden in the underground collection room. The method successfully deceived the sheriffs, so the Count's disappearance remained an unsolved case for years.
servingTerm1: Chelsea appears to have adapted to life in the detention room very well and has never attempted to escape. Although, surveillance footage shows that several people within the Bureau seem to be supplying her with expensive everyday products and entertainment items, and some are even hired to provide services such as massage and manicure to her.
servingTerm2: The subject has strained her eyes by doing long hours of lapidary work in the past and suffers from severe myopia, so she wears contact lenses all the time. When asked why she didn't get surgery to fix her eyesight, she answered that she couldn't trust those surgeries.
servingTerm3: Asking people whom she likes to be her sugar babies has become her signature behavior. Since most staff and Sinners have received expensive gifts from the subject, everyone tends to just ignore her strange behaviors.
servingTerm4: Due to her poor eyesight, the subject has not been doing lapidary work for years. But she has picked up her tools and begun practicing again for the Chief. She's made a pair of exquisite smoky quartz handcuffs as a gift for the Chief and claimed that the Chief is her property.
emotionCheck1:
[Chelsea looks at Sitri, thinking.]

**Countess Chelsea:** Why can't we raise cats here?

**Chief:** ……

* **Prompt:** You already have a "cat".
 * **Countess Chelsea:** Tsk. Cats and Sitri are different, you know?
 * **Countess Chelsea:** 😓😓

* **Prompt:** I mean, we can, but the process is complicated. You need to be patient.
 * **Countess Chelsea:** Fine... I'll be waiting.
 * **Countess Chelsea:** 😐
emotionCheck2:
[Chelsea hands you a gem.]

**Countess Chelsea:** Here. This souvenir is for you.

**Chief:** ……

* **Prompt:** Is it... a different gem again?
 * **Countess Chelsea:** Ha. Don't mention it. Feel free to just take it.
 * **Countess Chelsea:** 😏

* **Prompt:** I don't think the quality is as good as the last one.
 * **Countess Chelsea:** Impossible! It's purer than anything else before!
 * **Countess Chelsea:** 😫
supervision1:
++* ⚠ A Good Deed

//Countess Chelsea received a banner.//

**System Notifications:** An employee is very ill but cannot afford the expensive medical expenses. Just when he was desperate, he received a huge amount of money from Chelsea.

* **Prompt:** Guess that's one good deed.
supervision2:
++* ⚠ Forever Loser

//Countess Chelsea wired some money to you. It seems she wants to buy something.//

**System Notifications:** Countess Chelsea bought a few pool tables and put them in the Recreation Area. It caused quite a commotion, but she ended up losing the most games.

* **Prompt:** Hope she's learned her lesson.
supervision3:
++* ⚠ Steal the Style

//Someone is asking Countess Chelsea for fashion tips.//

**System Notifications:** Someone asks Countess Chelsea for fashion tips. Two days later, they receive a set of clothes identical to all of the Countess's outfits this season.

* **Prompt:** ...

**System Notifications:** That's Chelsea for you!
supervision4:
++* ⚠⚠ Not for Sale

//Countess Chelsea is working out something with a calculator.//

**System Notifications:** You see Countess Chelsea fiddling with a calculator.

* **Prompt:** Approach and ask

**Chief:** What are you doing?

**Countess Chelsea:** Oh? Hi there, Chief. I'm evaluating the Bureau's worth, but certain details are still not very clear to me.

**Countess Chelsea:** I plan to have my accountant visit me next week. I hope you'll approve that.

**Chief:** What's that for?

**Countess Chelsea:** I'm thinking of buying the whole Bureau. In a way, that will make you my sugar baby too.

**Countess Chelsea:** Relax, you can keep being Chief. You'll also get ten times your current wage and a bigger office. The Bureau's staff and supplies will be aptly replenished too... given that I succeed in buying it.

* **Prompt:** Stop the Countess

**Chief:** The Bureau is not for sale...
supervision5:
++* ⚠⚠ Thank-you Letter

//The Bureau receives a thank-you letter addressed to// Countess Idiot.

**System Notifications:** Countess Chelsea is reading a letter with a frown. You notice the letter is addressed to //Countess Idiot//.

**Countess Chelsea:** Oh? Hi there, Chief. I received a letter to mock me again. Why don't you read that out for me?

**Countess Chelsea:** I'm quite keen to learn how they'll insult me this time.

* **Prompt:** Read out the letter

**Chief:** "Dear 'Countess Idiot', I'm really sorry I don't know your name, but that's what the others call you."

**Countess Chelsea:** Are they calling me an idiot behind my back? Haha, like I care.

**Chief:** "Last month, you came and left a large sum of money to us. The others all say you're a reckless idiot."

**Countess Chelsea:** Praising me to my face and trashing me behind my back. How unsurprising, these two-faced hypocrites.

**Chief:** "But I don't think that. I bought some food for my family and cured my mother's illness with your money."

**Countess Chelsea:** Humph, finally, a grateful one. What else does the letter say?

**Chief:** "I wish to say thank you, Countess. You're not an idiot. You're the best person I've ever seen. I hope they release you soon."

**Chief:** That's the end of the letter.

**Countess Chelsea:** This letter... It's the first time... I...

**Countess Chelsea:** Chief, please allow me some privacy for now.
supervision6:
++* ⚠⚠⚠ The Countess is Here

//Countess Chelsea has apparently come up with a new way to splurge.//

**System Notifications:** You hear a clamor ahead.

**System Notifications:** "The Countess is here! The Countess is here!" A staff member is blowing a DIY trumpet and announcing this exhilarating news.

**System Notifications:** A red carpet rolls from afar and spreads to your feet.

**System Notifications:** Sitri is leading the way proudly while two rows of staff are sprinkling some petals they've collected in the air.

**System Notifications:** Countess Chelsea sits in a chair adorned with flowers and jewels. She's being carried by a few people on their shoulders and coming this way, surrounded by the crowd.

**System Notifications:** "Ahem, the Countess has given her order. She orders the Chief of the Bureau to accept the sugar baby offer at once with no delay!"
The trumpet blower announces the Countess's order loudly.

* **Prompt:** What's this all about?

**Countess Chelsea:** Hehe, what do you think? Fancy, right?

**Countess Chelsea:** I've watched a movie recently. This is what counts did in ancient times. How fun is that?

**Countess Chelsea:** I spent some gems to convince the Bureau's staff to organize this parade for me. It's turned out even better than I imagined.

**Countess Chelsea:** So, do you accept my offer?

* **Prompt:** Politely decline
 * **Chief:** Please forgive me, my lady. I'm unable to accept your offer at this moment.
 * **Chief:** But more importantly, you have severely violated the Sinner rules, my lady.
 * **Chief:** Guards, please take Her Ladyship to the Confinement Cell to stay for a few days. We'll discuss the punishment after that.
 * **Chief:** In addition, all staff who participated in this will have their bonus deducted from this month's salary.
 * **System Notifications:** Wails fill the room immediately.

* **Prompt:** Reject
 * **Chief:** You have severely violated the Sinner rules.
 * **Chief:** I'll proceed directly with the standard procedures...
 * **Chief:** Guards!
baseVoicelines:
[Obtain the Sinner]
I don't like being locked up... Say, how much do I need to pay to get out of here?

[Raise to Phase 1]
Oh? Is Sitri's clarity enhanced?

[Raise to Phase 3]
From now on, no one can hurt us. No one.

[Level Start]
Time for a vacation?

[Win Battles]
That's it?

[Lose Battles]
Oh... This feels worse than being rejected...

[Ultimate Skill]
Sitri, hold them off!

[Die in Battles]
How has it...come to this?

[Greeting]
Yo, you're back. It's been a while since I last saw you. I was a little concerned.

[Conversation 1]
Why do people always find me arrogant? I'm only honest about being rich.

[Conversation 2]
Look at the fire in this emerald. Isn't it gorgeous? In fact, unrefined, its clarity was just so-so, but good faceting techniques work magic.

[Conversation 3]
The kids here are all adorable, but why won't any of them take my money?

[Special Conversation 1]
I wonder how my kitties are doing at home... Can I bring them here, Chief? There aren't that many of them, just... a little over a hundred.

[Special Conversation 2]
I believe I exist in this world for the gems... But am I truly as dazzling as they are?

[Special Conversation 3]
What would you say if I want to be your sugar mama, Chief? I'm serious.

[Full Compliance]
This is an inheritance distribution agreement. Come sign your name on it... If something happens to me one day, take care of the kids... and Sitri, with this money. Got it?

[Idle]
Sitri, sweetheart, you know what to do when they come, don't you?

[Annoyed]
That reminds me, I've never paid to have somebody's limbs cut off. I'd like to try it sometime.

[Special Attention]
You've come to meet me specifically? Are you short on cash these days, Chief?

[Dispatch]
A piece of cake.

[Dispatch Complete]
I'm back. Look, I've brought everyone souvenirs.

[Level Up]
Not bad.

[Pat Head]
Oh, aren't you going to tickle my chin too? Who knows, I might purr a little for you.
attireVoicelines1:
[Attire Obtained]
Welcome to my estate! Chief... You're my rare and precious guest, just make yourself at home. It'll be so boring if you're too nervous.

[Greeting]
Let's have a drink? Relax, Chief... It's only pomegranate juice.

[Ordinary Contact 1]
Come closer, let me hear your breaths closely... Oh... you sound just like a kitten.

[Ordinary Contact 2]
Legend has it that if you keep chanting "Countess Chelsea, take me as your sugar baby" at a mirror in this room, no matter where I am, I'll immmediately appear. Don't you want to try it?

[Idle] 
Sitri, you're not eating your meals properly again today... Are the diamonds not to your taste? Sigh.. Got it, I'll fetch you a few of your favorite boulder opals now.

[Annoyed]
You're finally getting bolder, Chief. Can I treat this as love confession from you?

[Special Attention] 
Time to close the curtains and enjoy this night with just the two of us.

[Level Up}
The night is long. Wanna do something fun?
attireVoicelines2:
[Attire Obtained]
Did you lose this Golden Axe, or this Gemstone Axe? Don't be shy! You can take both if you like!

[Greeting]
Haha... You don't need to pretend that you dropped something into the lake. I can give you anything you want, but on one teensy little condition... that is, to stay with me forever~

[Ordinary Contact 1]
For those who don't suit my taste, even if every word they say is true, they are not worthy to take my collection.

[Ordinary Contact 2]
Every day, there are things that are forgotten, discarded, or lost. They slip right into the lake and come to me. So, what kind of things slipped through your fingers?

[Ordinary Contact 3]
Your palm is dry and warm... I love this feeling! Name your price. How many gems it takes for you to hold my hand like this forever?

[Ordinary Contact 4]
The water in the lake is my limbs, my heart, my dress... When you stir it, you are also touching me... Hehe, what, you don't believe me? I can really merge with the water~

[Idle] 
Sitri, you went playing treasure hunt at the bottom of the lake again? You've dug up all these centuries-old things... Come here, let me wipe your paws.

[Special Attention] 
If you're interested in me, just say it. I can take you to my home right now. Don't worry, I've already prepared your room at the bottom of the lake. I specially decorated it with pearl curtains and a bed made of gems. You'll definitely love it.

[Level Up}
Ah... Just as I thought, when the water becomes clear, one's mood is also lifted.

[Pat Head]
This flower crown is a precious gift from the spirits under the lake. What do you think? Much prettier than those accessories priced with a string of zeros, right?
nightmareTalent: Gain 200 [Illusory Moon Coins] when the Sinner is recruited into the team.

exclusiveCrimebrand.name: Shining Redemption
exclusiveCrimebrand.description: [Sitri] now stays until the battle ends. When [Sitri] is on the battlefield, [Dear Kitty] restores 40% / 45% / 50% of [Sitri]'s Max HP and petrifies all enemies within a 3x3 square around [Sitri] for 2 seconds.
exclusiveCrimebrand.flavourText:
"Bury the unbearable past with dazzling gems."
"From today onwards, I am free."

pros: Countess Chelsea and Sitri share health
cons: Requires ECB 1 to become a good tank
Chelsea herself only blocks 1 without Bulwark

guide.title: Summary
guide.text: While our MBCC sugar mommy's 2 in 1 tank deal is enticing to many beginners, I would not recommend raising her when starting out. This is because before unlocking Chelsea's ECB (which requires her to be lvl 70 and ranked up), Sitri will not stay on-field permanently. This is not so great when Chelsea's Ult cost is very high. Not only this, but Chelsea herself can only block 1 enemy, while most other Enduras have a base block of 2. Countess Chelsea has no offensive utility, and her Petrify CC isn't particuarly noticeable or useful either- high EP cost; slow cast time; and if they are in range to be petrified, you're likely already blocking them. The edge case is in Mania Training where the bosses really hurt, the petrify CC can actually help alleviate some pressure. Chelsea and Sitri can feel nice to use later on in Mania Training, but she won't be a priority to build.

crimebrandSets.name: Servant + Bulwark + Palace
crimebrandSets.note: Bulwark is important for Chelsea since her base block is only 1. Rift Palace reduces the damage of enemies that hit Countess Chelsea. Servant can be substituted for Fury.

shackles.title: Gem Fever
shackles.description: When an enemy is petrified, Countess Chelsea and [Sitri] recover 3% of their Max HP.

shackles.title: Loyal Guard
shackles.description: If Countess Chelsea and [Sitri's] HP drops below 30% after [Shared Fate] is triggered, they both recover 4% of their Max HP.

shackles.title: Energy Overflowing
shackles.description: Countess Chelsea gains 10 energy when battle starts.

skills.name: Crystal Claws
skills.description: Countess Chelsea attacks with a crystal sword, dealing (93% of her Attack) Physical Damage each time.

skills.name: Dear Kitty
skills.description: Countess Chelsea summons [Sitri] on the target grid to assist her. [Sitri] has 80% of Countess Chelsea's Max HP and can block 2 enemies. Sitri stays for 20 seconds and deals (100% of Countess Chelsea's Normal Attack) damage each time. Only one [Sitri] can exist on the battlefield at a time.

skills.name: Behave, Or Get Petrified
skills.description: Normal Attacks of Countess Chelsea and [Sitri] have a 8% chance to petrify the hit enemy for 2 seconds. The effect has a 12-second cooldown.

skills.name: Shared Fate
skills.description: [Sitri] gains 10% damage reduction. During a battle, the health of Countess Chelsea and [Sitri] is automatically redistributed so that they have the same health percentage. The effect has a 4-second cooldown.

compliance: Unlocke File: Monitor Record, Life +55, Magic Resistance +7
Unlock Voice: Special Conversation 1, Life + 55, Magic Resistance + 7
Unlock File: Performance in Serving Term
Unlock Voice: Special Conversation 3, Unlock Requirements: Complete the Chelsea's review
Unlock File: Performance in Serving Terms, Unlocked voice: Full Compliance, Unlock Sinner Title: Treasure of the Earl of Gems

voicelines.Obtain the Sinner - EN: I don't like being locked up... Say, how much do I need to pay to get out of here?
voicelines.Obtain the Sinner - JP: 閉じ込められるのは好きじゃないわ……さて、値段を決めましょう。ここを出るのにいくらかかるわけ？
voicelines.Obtain the Sinner - KR: 난 갇혀있는 걸 싫어해… 여길 떠나는데 얼마면 되니?
voicelines.Obtain the Sinner - CN: 我不喜欢被关着……开个价吧，离开这儿要花多少钱？
voicelines.Obtain the Sinner - TW: 我不喜歡被關著……開個價吧，離開這裡要花多少錢？
voicelines.Raise to Phase 1 - JP: へえ？シディーの透明度が上がったの？
voicelines.Raise to Phase 1 - KR: 그래? 시트리의 청결도가 올라간 거 아니야?
voicelines.Raise to Phase 1 - CN: 哦？西迪的净度是不是上升了？
voicelines.Raise to Phase 1 - TW: 哦？西迪的淨度是不是上升了？
voicelines.Raise to Phase 3 - EN: From now on, no one can hurt us. No one.
voicelines.Raise to Phase 3 - JP: これからは、誰もあたしたちを傷つけることはできない。誰も、ね。
voicelines.Raise to Phase 3 - KR: 앞으로 아무도 우리를 해칠 수 없어, 아무도.
voicelines.Raise to Phase 3 - CN: 以后，没有人能伤害我们，没有人。
voicelines.Raise to Phase 3 - TW: 以後，沒有人能傷害我們，沒有人。
voicelines.Level Start - JP: バカンスに行くとしようか？

voicelines.Lose Battles - KR: 흑… 이거 거절당하는 것보다 더 괴로운데…
voicelines.Lose Battles - CN: 呜……这比被人拒绝还难受……
voicelines.Lose Battles - TW: 嗚……這比被人拒絕還難受……
voicelines.Ultimate Skill - JP: シディー、奴らを止めて！
voicelines.Die in Battles - EN: How has it... come to this?
voicelines.Greeting - EN: Yo, you're back. It's been a while since I last saw you. I was a little concerned.
voicelines.Greeting - JP: あら、おかえりなさい。しばらく見ないから、ちょっと心配してたのよ。
voicelines.Greeting - KR: 어머, 돌아왔나 보네. 한동안 안 보여서 걱정했어.
voicelines.Greeting - CN: 哟，你回来了。有段时间没见，我都有点儿担心了。
voicelines.Greeting - TW: 喲，你回來了。有段時間沒見，我都有點擔心了。
voicelines.Conversation 1 - EN: Why do people always find me arrogant? I'm only honest about being rich.
voicelines.Conversation 1 - JP: どうしていつも威張ってるって言われるのかしら？あたしはただ、お金を持ってるって事実を言ってるだけなのに。
voicelines.Conversation 1 - KR: 왜 자꾸 날 오만하다고 하는 거지? 나는 단지 돈이 많다는 사실에 대해 솔직할 뿐이야.
voicelines.Conversation 1 - CN: 为什么总有人说我嚣张呢？我只是对有钱这事儿很坦诚罢了。
voicelines.Conversation 1 - TW: 為什麼總有人說我囂張呢？我只是對有錢這事很坦誠罷了。
voicelines.Conversation 2 - EN: Look at the fire in this emerald. Isn't it gorgeous? In fact, unrefined, its clarity was just so-so, but good faceting techniques work magic.
voicelines.Conversation 2 - JP: 見て、このエメラルド。とてもきれいでしょう？ふふふ、実は原石の透明度はたいしたことはないの。上手く切り出して加工するとこんなに綺麗になるのよ。
voicelines.Conversation 2 - KR: 이 에메랄드의 빛깔 좀 봐, 정말 예쁘지? 훗, 이 원석의 순도는 사실 별로지만 훌륭한 커팅 기술로 살려낸 거야.
voicelines.Conversation 2 - CN: 你看这颗祖母绿的火彩，是不是很漂亮？哼哼，它原石的净度其实不怎么样，不过，好的切工就是可以化腐朽为神奇。
voicelines.Conversation 2 - TW: 你看這顆祖母綠的火彩，是不是很漂亮？哼哼，它原石的淨度其實不怎麼樣，不過，好的切工就是可以化腐朽為神奇。
voicelines.Conversation 3 - EN: The kids here are all adorable, but why won't any of them take my money?
voicelines.Conversation 3 - JP: ここの子たちはみんなかわいいわね。本当にお金はいらないのかしら？
voicelines.Conversation 3 - KR: 이곳의 아이들은 다 너무 귀여워, 근데 왜 다들 내 돈을 받지 않으려 하는 거지?
voicelines.Conversation 3 - CN: 这里的孩子都好可爱，可为什么他们都不肯接受我的爱护呢？
voicelines.Conversation 3 - TW: 這裡的孩子都好可愛，可為什麼他們都不肯要我的錢呢？
voicelines.Special Conversation 1 - EN: I wonder how my kitties are doing at home... Can I bring them here, Chief? There aren't that many of them, just... a little over a hundred.
voicelines.Special Conversation 1 - JP: うちの家にいる猫も、どうなったかわからないわね……局長、あの子たちここに連れてきてもいいかしら？たいした数じゃないわ……100匹くらいだもの。
voicelines.Special Conversation 1 - KR: 집에 있는 고양이들이 어떻게 됐는지 모르겠어… 국장, 애들을 여기로 데려와도 될까? 몇 마리 안 돼, 그래봤자… 백 마리 정도야.
voicelines.Special Conversation 1 - CN: 家里的猫，也不知道怎么样了……局长，我能把它们带来这儿吗？没多少，也就……一百来只吧。
voicelines.Special Conversation 1 - TW: 家裡的貓，也不知道怎麼樣了……局長，我能把它們帶來這嗎？沒多少，也就……一百來隻吧。
voicelines.Special Conversation 2 - EN: I believe I exist in this world for the gems... But am I truly as dazzling as they are?
voicelines.Special Conversation 2 - JP: あたしは自分が宝石のために生まれてきたと思ってるわ。……でも、本当にあの子たちと同じくらい輝いているのかしら？
voicelines.Special Conversation 2 - KR: 나는 내가 보석을 위해 태어난 거라 생각해… 그런데 내가 정말 보석만큼 눈부실까?
voicelines.Special Conversation 2 - CN: 我认为我就是为宝石而生的……但我真的和它们一样耀眼吗？
voicelines.Special Conversation 2 - TW: 我認為我就是為寶石而生的……但我真的和他們一樣耀眼嗎？
voicelines.Special Conversation 3 - EN: What would you say if I want to be your sugar mama, Chief? I'm serious.
voicelines.Special Conversation 3 - JP: 局長、もしあたしがあなたを愛人にしたいと言ったら、どう思う？ 本気よ。
voicelines.Special Conversation 3 - KR: 국장, 내가 너를 거둬키우겠다고 하면 어떨 것 같아? 난 진지해.
voicelines.Special Conversation 3 - CN: 局长，如果我说我想养你一辈子，你觉得怎么样？我是认真的。
voicelines.Special Conversation 3 - TW: 局長，如果我說我想包養你，你覺得怎麼樣？我是認真的。
voicelines.Full Compliance - EN: This is an inheritance distribution agreement. Come sign your name on it... If something happens to me one day, take care of the kids... and Sitri, with this money. Got it?
voicelines.Full Compliance - JP: これが遺産分割協議書よ。こっちに来てサインして……あたしに何かあったら、このお金で、あの可愛い子ちゃんたち……と、シディーの面倒を見て。わかった？
voicelines.Full Compliance - KR: 이건 유산 배분 협의서야, 여기 와서 네 이름을 써…만약 어느 날 내가 잘못되면 이 돈으로 그 귀여운 녀석들을 잘 돌봐줘… 그리고 시트리도, 알겠지?
voicelines.Full Compliance - CN: 这是遗产分配协议，过来，签上你的名字……万一哪天我有个三长两短，拿着这笔钱，照顾好那些小可爱们……还有西迪，明白了吗？
voicelines.Full Compliance - TW: 這是遺產分配協議，過來，簽上你的名字……萬一哪天我有個三長兩短，拿著這筆錢，照顧好那些小可愛們……還有西迪，明白了嗎？
voicelines.Idle - EN: Sitri, sweetheart, you know what to do when they come, don't you?
voicelines.Idle - JP: シディー、いい子ね。誰か来たら、どうすればいいか……わかってるわよね。
voicelines.Idle - KR: 시트리, 착하지, 이따가 누가 오면 어떻게 해야 할지 알지?
voicelines.Idle - CN: 西迪，乖孩子，待会儿有人来了你知道该怎么做的对吧。
voicelines.Idle - TW: 西迪，乖孩子，待會有人來了你知道該怎麼做的對吧。
voicelines.Annoyed - EN: That reminds me, I've never paid to have somebody's limbs cut off. I'd like to try it sometime.
voicelines.Annoyed - JP: 人の手足って買ったことがないのよね。いつかしてみたいわ。
voicelines.Annoyed - KR: 난 아직 돈으로 누군가의 손발을 사 본 적이 없는데, 정말 해보고 싶어.
voicelines.Annoyed - CN: 不如你就答应我，让我养你一辈子吧，到时候你想怎么动，就怎么动。
voicelines.Annoyed - TW: 我還沒試過花錢買人的手腳，真想試試看啊。
voicelines.Special Attention - EN: You've come to meet me specifically? Are you short on cash these days, Chief?
voicelines.Special Attention - JP: あら、そんなにまじめな顔をしてやって来るだなんて……お金に困っているのかしら？
voicelines.Special Attention - KR: 이렇게 정중하게 찾아오다니… 국장, 요즘 돈이 부족해?
voicelines.Special Attention - CN: 居然这么郑重地来找我……局长，你最近是缺钱了吗？
voicelines.Special Attention - TW: 居然這麼鄭重地來找我……局長，你最近是缺錢了嗎？
voicelines.Dispatch Complete - EN: I'm back. Look, I've brought everyone souvenirs.
voicelines.Dispatch Complete - JP: ただいま。ほら、みんなにお土産よ。
voicelines.Dispatch Complete - KR: 다녀왔어. 봐봐, 여러분을 위해 기념품을 챙겨왔어.
voicelines.Dispatch Complete - CN: 我回来了。看，我给大家都带了纪念品。
voicelines.Dispatch Complete - TW: 我回來了。看，我給大家都帶了紀念品。
voicelines.Pat Head - EN: Oh, aren't you going to tickle my chin too? Who knows, I might purr a little for you.
voicelines.Pat Head - JP: あら？あごは触らなくていいの？もしかしたら、あたしも猫みたいに鳴くかもしれないわよ。
voicelines.Pat Head - KR: 어? 내 턱 안 만져주는 거야? 나도 그릉그릉 소리를 내줄지 몰라.
voicelines.Pat Head - CN: 嗯？你这是想听我也呼噜呼噜？
voicelines.Pat Head - TW: 嗯？不摸摸我的下巴嗎？說不定我也會呼嚕呼嚕。

voicelines.Attire Obtained - EN: Welcome to my estate! Chief... You're my rare and precious guest, just make yourself at home. It'll be so boring if you're too nervous.
voicelines.Attire Obtained - JP: ようこそあたしの荘園へ！局長……やっと来られたんだから、自分の家だと思って楽しんでって。遠慮なんてしたら、つまらないわよ。
voicelines.Attire Obtained - KR: 나의 장원에 온 걸 환영해, 국장! …모처럼 방문한 거니까 내 집처럼 편하게 지내도록 해. 너무 딱딱하게 굴면 재미없다?
voicelines.Attire Obtained - CN: 欢迎来到我的庄园！局长……你难得来一趟，把这里当成自己家就好。太拘束，可是会很无聊的。
voicelines.Attire Obtained - TW: 歡迎來到我的莊園！局長……你難得來一趟，把這裡當成自己家就好。太拘束，可是會很無聊的。
voicelines.Greeting - EN: Let's have a drink? Relax, Chief... It's only pomegranate juice.
voicelines.Greeting - JP: 一緒に1杯どう～？安心して、局長——これは、ただのザクロジュース。
voicelines.Greeting - KR: 같이 한잔할래~? 걱정 마, 국장… 이건 그냥 석류 주스니까.
voicelines.Greeting - CN: 一起来喝一杯么~？放心吧局长——这只是石榴汁而已。
voicelines.Greeting - TW: 一起來喝一杯嗎~？放心吧局長——這只是石榴汁而已。
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 1 - EN: Come closer, let me hear your breaths closely... Oh... you sound just like a kitten.
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 1 - JP: もっと近づいて。じっくり呼吸の音を聞かせて——あ……子猫みたい。
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 1 - KR: 좀 더 가까이 와. 네 숨소리를 들을 수 있게… 아… 마치 고양이처럼.
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 1 - CN: 再靠近我一点，让我仔细听听你的呼吸声——啊……就像小猫一样。
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 1 - TW: 再靠近我一點，讓我仔細聽聽你的呼吸聲——啊……就像小貓一樣。
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 2 - EN: Legend has it that if you keep chanting "Countess Chelsea, take me as your sugar baby" at a mirror in this room, no matter where I am, I'll immediately appear. Don't you want to try it?
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 2 - JP: この部屋の鏡に「チェルシー伯爵、私を愛人にして」「チェルシー伯爵、私を愛人にして」って繰り返すと、あたしがどこにいてもすぐに現れるという噂があるの。どう、試してみない？
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 2 - KR: 이 방에서 거울을 보며 '첼시 백작이 날 스폰 해준다, 첼시 백작이 날 스폰 해준다'라는 말을 반복하면, 내가 어디에 있든 바로 이곳에 나타난대. 어때, 한번 해볼래?
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 2 - CN: 据说在这间屋子里对着镜子反复念上几遍“切尔西伯爵包养我”“切尔西伯爵包养我”。无论我在什么地方，都会立刻出现在这里哦，怎么样，不来试试么？
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 2 - TW: 據說在這間屋子裡對著鏡子反覆唸上幾遍「切爾西伯爵包養我」「切爾西伯爵包養我」。無論我在什麼地方，都會立刻出現在這裡哦，怎麼樣，不來試試嗎？
voicelines.Idle - EN: Sitri, you're not eating your meals properly again today... Are the diamonds not to your taste? Sigh... Got it, I'll fetch you a few of your favorite boulder opals now.
voicelines.Idle - JP: シディー、今日もちゃんとご飯食べてない……ダイヤモンドが口に合わないの？はぁ……わかった、あなたが大好きなブラックオパールにすぐ替えるわ。
voicelines.Idle - KR: 시트리, 오늘도 밥을 잘 못 먹는구나… 다이아몬드가 입에 안 맞니? 휴… 알았어. 얼른 가서 네가 제일 좋아하는 블랙 오팔로 바꿔올게.
voicelines.Idle - CN: 西迪你今天又不好好吃饭……是钻石不合你的胃口么？唉……我知道了，我马上就去换几颗你最喜欢的黑欧珀。
voicelines.Idle - TW: 西迪你今天又不好好吃飯……是鑽石不合你的胃口嗎？唉……我知道了，我馬上就去換幾顆你最喜歡的黑蛋白石。
voicelines.Annoyed - EN: You're finally getting bolder, Chief. Can I treat this as a love confession from you?
voicelines.Annoyed - JP: 局長、やっとわかってくれた。これはあたしに愛を示す信号って理解していいかしら！
voicelines.Annoyed - KR: 국장, 드디어 철이 들었구나? 나를 향한 사랑의 표시라고 생각할게!
voicelines.Annoyed - CN: 局长你终于开窍了，我可以把这当成是你向我示爱的信号么！
voicelines.Annoyed - TW: 局長你終於開竅了，我可以把這當成是你向我示愛的信號嗎！
voicelines.Special Attention - EN: Time to close the curtains and enjoy this night with just the two of us.
voicelines.Special Attention - JP: カーテンを閉めて。あなたとあたし、二人だけの夜を楽しみましょう。
voicelines.Special Attention - KR: 커튼을 쳐야겠어. 우리 둘만의 밤을 즐길 수 있도록 말이야.
voicelines.Special Attention - CN: 该拉上窗帘，享受只有你我二人的夜晚了。
voicelines.Special Attention - TW: 該拉上窗簾，享受只有你我二人的夜晚了。
voicelines.Level Up - EN: The night is long. Wanna do something fun?
voicelines.Level Up - JP: 夜は長いわ。面白いことでもしましょう？
voicelines.Level Up - KR: 밤은 기니까, 좀 더 재밌는 걸 해보지 않을래?
voicelines.Level Up - CN: 长夜漫漫，要做些有趣的事么？
voicelines.Level Up - TW: 長夜漫漫，要做些有趣的事嗎？

voicelines.Attire Obtained - EN: Did you lose this Golden Axe, or this Gemstone Axe? Don't be shy! You can take both if you like!
voicelines.Attire Obtained - JP: あなたが落としたのはこの金の斧？それとも宝石の斧？遠慮しないで。気に入ったなら、両方持っていって～
voicelines.Attire Obtained - KR: 네가 떨어뜨린 게 금도끼야 아니면 보석도끼야? 사양하지 말고 마음에 들면 다 가져가도록 해~
voicelines.Attire Obtained - CN: 你丢的是这把金斧头呢，还是这把宝石斧头？不要跟我客气，喜欢的话，可以都拿走~
voicelines.Attire Obtained - TW: 你丟的是這把金斧頭呢，還是這把寶石斧頭？不要跟我客氣，喜歡的話，可以都拿走~
voicelines.Greeting - EN: Haha... You don't need to pretend that you dropped something into the lake. I can give you anything you want, but on one teensy little condition... that is, to stay with me forever~
voicelines.Greeting - JP: あはは～湖に何か落としたふりなんてしなくていいのに。欲しいものはなんでもあげる。ちょっとした報酬をくれれば——永遠にあたしの傍にいてくれればね～
voicelines.Greeting - KR: 하하~ 호수에 뭘 떨어뜨린 척할 필요 없어. 원하는 건 내가 다 줄 수 있으니까. 난 아주 작은 보답만 있으면 돼. 그건 바로 네가 영원히 내 곁에 남아있는 거야~
voicelines.Greeting - CN: 哈哈~不用假装有东西掉进了湖里，你想要的我都可以给你，我只收一点儿微不足道的报酬就行——永远留在我身边吧~
voicelines.Greeting - TW: 哈哈~不用假裝有東西掉進了湖裡，你想要的我都可以給你，我只收一點微不足道的報酬就行——永遠留在我身邊吧~
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 1 - EN: For those who don't suit my taste, even if every word they say is true, they are not worthy to take my collection.
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 1 - JP: あたしの好みに合わない奴は、たとえその言葉が全て真実でも、あたしのコレクションを貰う資格はないのよ～
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 1 - KR: 내 취향에 안 맞는 녀석들은 아무리 진실을 말해도 내 소장품을 가져갈 자격이 없어~
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 1 - CN: 不合我口味的家伙，就算句句是真话，也不配把我的收藏带走~
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 1 - TW: 不合我口味的傢伙，就算句句是真話，也不配把我的收藏帶走~
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 2 - EN: Every day, there are things that are forgotten, discarded, or lost. They slip right into the lake and come to me. So, what kind of things slipped through your fingers?
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 2 - JP: 忘れられたもの、捨てられたもの、通り過ぎていったものが、毎日湖からあたしのもとへ滑り落ちてくる……それで、あなたの指をすり抜けていったものはどれ？
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 2 - KR: 매일 같이 잊힌 것들, 버려진 것들, 놓쳐버린 것들이 수면 위를 맴돌다 내 곁으로 밀려오지… 그렇다면 네 손가락 사이로 빠져나간 건 이 중에 어떤 것일까?
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 2 - CN: 每天都会有被忘记的，被抛弃的，被错失的东西，从湖面滑落至我的身边……那么，从你指缝中溜走的，是哪一种呢？
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 2 - TW: 每天都會有被忘記的，被拋棄的，被錯失的東西，從湖面滑落至我的身邊……那麼，從你指縫中溜走的，是哪一種呢？
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 3 - EN: Your palm is dry and warm... I love this feeling! Name your price. How many gems it takes for you to hold my hand like this forever?
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 3 - JP: あなたの手のひらって、乾いていて温かいね……この感触、気に入ったわ！値段を言って。このままあたしの手を握り続けてもらうには、宝石をいくつあげればいい？
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 3 - KR: 네 손바닥은 건조하고 따스하네… 촉감이 마음에 들어! 가격을 말해봐. 계속 이렇게 내 손을 잡고 있게 하려면 보석을 얼마나 주면 돼?
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 3 - CN: 你的手心干燥又温暖……我喜欢这个触感！开个价吧，我要给你多少宝石，才能让你像这样一直牵着我的手？
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 3 - TW: 你的手心乾燥又溫暖……我喜歡這個觸感！開個價吧，我要給你多少寶石，才能讓你像這樣一直牽著我的手？
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 4 - EN: The water in the lake is my limbs, my heart, my dress... When you stir it, you are also touching me... Hehe, what, you don't believe me? I can really merge with the water~
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 4 - JP: 湖の水はあたしの手足であり、心臓であり、スカートの裾……つまり、あなたが水に触れる時はあたしに触れてるってこと……ふふ、信じないの？本当に水に溶け込めるのに～
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 4 - KR: 호수는 나의 팔과 다리이자 심장, 치맛자락이야… 호수를 건드리는 건 날 쓰다듬는 것과 같아… 하하, 왜, 안 믿겨? 하지만 난 정말 물속에 녹아들 수 있는걸~
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 4 - CN: 湖水是我的四肢，我的心脏，我的裙摆……当你撩动它时，也就是在抚摸着我……呵呵，怎么，你不信吗？我可是真的能融入水中的哦~
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 4 - TW: 湖水是我的四肢，我的心臟，我的裙擺……當你撩動它時，也就是在撫摸著我……呵呵，怎麼，你不信嗎？我可是真的能融入水中的哦~
voicelines.Idle - EN: Sitri, you went playing treasure hunt at the bottom of the lake again? You've dug up all these centuries-old things... Come here, let me wipe your paws.
voicelines.Idle - JP: シディー、また湖の底で宝探しをしていたの？何百年も前の古いものを全部掘り出して……よし、こっちへおいで。足を拭いてあげる。
voicelines.Idle - KR: 시트리, 또 호수 바닥에서 보물찾기 놀이를 하고 있었구나. 몇백 년 전의 낡은 물건들을 다 파헤쳐 놨네… 하아, 발톱을 닦아줄 테니까 어서 이리 오렴.
voicelines.Idle - CN: 西迪，你又去湖底玩寻宝游戏了啊。把这些几百年前的旧东西都刨出来了……唉，快过来，我给你擦擦爪子。
voicelines.Idle - TW: 西迪，你又去湖底玩尋寶遊戲了啊。把這些幾百年前的舊東西都刨出來了……唉，快過來，我給你擦擦爪子。
voicelines.Special Attention - EN: If you're interested in me, just say it. I can take you to my home right now. Don't worry, I've already prepared your room at the bottom of the lake. I specially decorated it with pearl curtains and a bed made of gems. You'll definitely love it.
voicelines.Special Attention - JP: あたしに興味があるならそう言って。今すぐ家に招待してあげるよ～。心配しないで。湖の底に、真珠のカーテンと宝石のベッドを備えた部屋を用意してあるから。きっと気に入るよ～
voicelines.Special Attention - KR: 나한테 관심 있으면 그냥 말로 해. 당장이라도 우리 집에 초대할 수 있으니까~ 안심하라고. 호수 밑의 네 방도 다 준비되어 있거든. 특별히 널 위해 진주 커튼과 보석 침대도 마련했어. 분명 마음에 들 거야~
voicelines.Special Attention - CN: 对我感兴趣就直说嘛，我现在就可以招待你去我家玩~放心，你在湖底的房间我也早就准备好了，特地给你用上了珍珠帘子和宝石床，你一定会喜欢的~
voicelines.Special Attention - TW: 對我感興趣就直說嘛，我現在就可以招待你去我家玩~放心，你在湖底的房間我也早就準備好了，特地給你用上了珍珠簾子和寶石床，你一定會喜歡的~
voicelines.Level Up - EN: Ah... Just as I thought, when the water becomes clear, one's mood is also lifted.
voicelines.Level Up - JP: ふぅ～やっぱり水が綺麗になると、気分も良くなるわね～
voicelines.Level Up - KR: 후우~ 역시 물이 맑아지니까 기분도 좋아지네~
voicelines.Level Up - CN: 呼~果然，水变清澈了，心情也会变好~
voicelines.Level Up - TW: 呼~果然，水變清澈了，心情也會變好~
voicelines.Pat Head - EN: This flower crown is a precious gift from the spirits under the lake. What do you think? Much prettier than those accessories priced with a string of zeros, right?
voicelines.Pat Head - JP: この花冠は、湖底の精霊からの大切な贈り物よ。どう？値札にゼロがいくつもついた装飾品よりずっと素敵でしょ？
voicelines.Pat Head - KR: 이 화환은 호수 밑 정령들이 내게 준 귀중한 선물이야. 어때? 뒤에 0만 많이 붙은 값비싼 액세서리보다 훨씬 예쁘지 않아?
voicelines.Pat Head - CN: 这花环可是湖底生灵给我的宝贵礼物。怎么样，比那些标价好多个零的装饰品好看多了吧？
voicelines.Pat Head - TW: 這花環可是湖底生靈給我的寶貴禮物。怎麼樣，比那些標價好多個零的裝飾品好看多了吧？
